layout.name: jumpSet
layout.title: Jump Behavior
layout.tooltip: Determines how it would jump. <b>Don't Jump<b> - it will not jump. <b>Jump<b> - it will jump upwards. <b>Jump Up & Down Blocks<b> - it will jump up and down through blocks.

layout.name: hitSet
layout.title: Hit Behavior
layout.tooltip: Determines how it is fought throughout the fight. <b>Hit Head Consecutively<b> - it will not jump. <b>Jump<b> - it will jump upwards. <b>Jump Up & Down Blocks<b> - it will jump up and down through blocks.
